title: Roche 's expenditure on research and development 2007 to 2019
summary: In general Expenditure in million Swiss francs has rose over the Year.
Expenditure in million Swiss francs is roughly constant from 2011 to 2014, and finally slightly increasing from 2014 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Expenditure in million Swiss francs, of value 11047.0 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Expenditure in million Swiss francs, of value 8073.0 was reported at Year 2011
